mapper.sql: id, pc_id, fjzy_id, jhmc, pymb, xzyxxnx, pyfshff, pyfaypyjh, kcszhxfgd, sjlw, pygl, sfsc, sfxf, xfsj, cjr, gxsj, gxr
mapper.select: select tpj.id as id, pc_id,pc.pch as pch, pc.pcmc as pcmc, pc.jylx as jylx, jhmc, pymb, xzyxxnx, pyfshff, pyfaypyjh, kcszhxfgd, sjlw, pygl, fjzy_id, tpj.sfsc as sfsc, tpj.sfxf, tpj.xfsj, tpj.cjsj, tpj.cjr, tpj.gxsj, tpj.gxr from t_py_jh tpj left join t_pc pc on (tpj.pc_id = pc.id) where tpj.sfsc = false and pc.sfsc = false and tpj.fjjg_id = #{fjjgId} and pc.pch like concat('%',trim(#{pch}),'%') and pc.jylx = trim(#{jylx}) and tpj.jhmc like concat('%',trim(#{jhmc}),'%') order by tpj.sfxf asc, tpj.cjsj desc
select distinct pc.* from t_pc pc left join t_py_jh tpj on (tpj.pc_id = pc.id) where tpj.sfsc = false and tpj.sfxf = true and pc.sfsc = false order by pc.cjsj desc
